segments.text: I notice the little boy climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, balancing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s doing that right under his mom’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s about to get away with something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to get in trouble if they’re caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s plate is already half-full of cookies, and he’s still grabbing more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall—it’s a long way down from up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
